suparman padaka kotagath mithya kathawa nawa arthakathanayakin yuthuwa idiripath kirima sandaha chithrapataye aarambhaka miniththu wissa kapa kalada, sankshipthayen idiripath kerena ‘kriptan’ grahalowa pilibanda handinwimath, supiri hakiyawan uruma karagath ladaru supar man pruthiwiyata ewanu labana andamath, suparmange piyage parama sathura wana jenaral sod (mayikal shanon) asadharana andamin, kese ho diwi galawa ganimata samathwana andamath, kisisethma prekshakaya balaporoththu nowu idiripath kirimak nowana bawa kiwa yuthuya.
